heading: This booking system is now closed
spiel: All bookable meeting rooms in the Longbenton Digital Hub (Building 9) are now available as resources within Outlook and can be booked in the same, easy way as inviting a person to a meeting.
spiel2: Rooms are also supplemented with a touch-screen booking panel outside each room, which allows a meeting to be instantly booked and / or extended without using Outlook.
moreInfo: For more information and links to guidance, {{-link-start}}please click here{{-link-end}}.
